name: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu Rookies
overview: A popular series of baseball games that have recorded million sales, Moero!! Pro Yakyuu is now available for WonderSwan! The biggest feature of this series is the unique point of view projected from the center as well as on TV. There are many baseball games from behind perspective, but the Moero!! Pro Yakyuu series has been familiar with the perspective from the center since the first series released on Nintendo. This Wonderswan version features a rookie mode where you can create your own player and train him. He can also be placed to the team of your choice. You will be able to join your own character in a real baseball team and fight the pennant race while mixing with real players. And of course, the final goal is to be a rookie king!
